loans.name: Maria Betty

texts.es:
Maria es una persona muy trabajadora que ha logrado sacar su propio restaurante adelante, el cual montó desde hace unos 8 meses en busca de mejores condiciones económicas para su hogar. A pesar de que su restaurante lo inició con muy bajo capital, Maria ha logrado con su esfuerzo ir superando la dificultad de capital que tiene e ir ofreciendo cada vez mejores productos a sus clientes. Gracias a su restaurante, Maria ha logrado ir aportando económicamente en su hogar para mejorar la calidad de vida en el hogar donde convive con su esposo y sus 5 hijos, de modo que sus hijos ya pueden acceder a una educación de mejor calidad y han ido superando poco a poco las grandes dificultades económicas que tenían en la familia. Debido a que su restaurante viene creciendo, Maria busca un préstamo para comprar un refrigerador donde pueda almacenar los alimentos, pues el que tiene actualmente es muy pequeño y ya presenta algunas fallas.

De esta manera seguirá ofreciendo muy buenos productos a sus clientes permitiéndole seguir creciendo y captar cada vez más clientes. Su mayor sueño es llegar a tener un gran restaurante y que este le permita tener una mejor calidad de vida en su hogar y ofrecerles a sus hijos mejores oportunidades para salir adelante.
texts.en:
Maria is a very hardworking person who has managed to get her own restaurant ahead, which she started eight months ago in search of better economic conditions for her household. Although she started her restaurant with very little capital, Maria has managed to overcome the difficulty of capital that she has with her effort and is offering every time better products to her customers. Thanks to her restaurant,  Maria has been contributing economically to her household to improve the quality of life at home where she lives with her husband and their five children in such a way that her children are able to access a better quality education and have been overcoming gradually the great financial difficulties that the family had. Since the restaurant has been growing, Maria is looking for a loan to buy a refrigerator where she can store food since the one she currently has is very small and has some faults.

In this way, she will continue offering very good products to her customers allowing her to keep growing and capture each time more customers. Her greatest dream is to have  big restaurant and that this will allow her to have a better quality of life at home and to offer her children better opportunities to get ahead.

loans.use: to buy a refrigerator where she can store food since what she had not is very small and has some faults.

loans.name: Prene

texts.en:
Prene is in her late fifties, married, and has four children, ranging in age from 18 to 34. They live in a very small village in the mountains in northern Albania that is not accessible by every vehicle. Life in this rural region is very difficult during the extended winter time, up to eight months.

Prene has had a goat-husbandry business for about 20 years. The first years it was extremely difficult due to the lack of clientele, according to her. However, during recent years there was a turnaround, and she has got many more clients, which has made her happy, so she wants to continue the same activity.

Prene is requesting a loan now to purchase goats in the hope that this will grow her business and increase profits.

loans.use: To buy goats

loans.name: Eusebia

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al trabaja en una institucion publica y tambien la socia abrio su tienda donde vende ropa como pantalones,blusas y chompas,la socia vende para caballeros,niños y damas,la socia ya viene trabajando 8 años en esta institucion,el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de tienda de venta de ropa.La socia solicita el credito para comprar polos,chompas y pantalones al por mayor.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member continues to be dedicated to work in a public institution and also opened a shop where she sells clothing like pants, blouses and  sweaters. The member sells for men, children and women. She has been working at the institution for eight years. Her dream is to expand her clothing shop business. She is requesting the loan to buy polos, sweaters and pants and wholesale.

The member is happy about the loan and promises to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy polos, sweaters and pants at wholesale.

loans.name: Luis Javier

texts.es:
Luis aprendió desde muy joven la actividad de la agricultura gracias a que su padre se dedicaba a esta actividad y desde muy joven se la enseñó, permitiéndole tener una gran experiencia para desempeñar la labor. Luis se encuentra casado y tiene 2 hijos, y para generar los ingresos que requiere en su hogar tiene un cultivo de verduras el cual comercializa en la plaza de mercados de su municipio. Su gran ventaja es la experiencia que tiene en la actividad, y su dificultad más grande es la falta de capital para sacar adelante sus cultivos; y buscando superar esta dificultad, Luis busca un préstamo para comprar insumos como abonos, insecticidas y riegos para sacar adelante su cultivo y ofrecer productos de buena calidad a sus clientes.

Su mayor sueño es poder tener una buena calidad de vida y mejores oportunidades económicas tanto para el como para su familia. Además, espera que en un futuro su cultivo crezca y pueda generar empleo para las personas más necesitadas.
texts.en:
Luis learned the business of agriculture from a very young age thanks to his father who also farmed and taught him, giving him a great experience with work.  Luis is married with 2 children, and he earns a living for his family with his vegetable crop that he sells in the town market.  

His biggest advantage is his experience, and his biggest difficulty is the lack of capital to get crops.  Hoping to overcome this challenge, Luis is looking for a loan to buy products like fertilizers, insecticides, and irrigation to advance his crops and offer better products of higher quality to his customers.

His dream is to have a better quality of life and better financial opportunities for himself and his family.  Also, he hopes that his crop will grow large enough so that he will be able to employ people in need.

loans.use: buy products like fertilizers, insecticides, and irrigation to advance his crop and offer high quality products to his customers.

loans.name: Diego

texts.es:
Diego es un hombre de 27 años, jovial y con el ímpetu que caracteriza a los jóvenes emprendedores. Día a día se esfuerza trabajando para mejorar su calidad de vida; vive en la casa de sus padres, junto a ellos y a sus hermanos.
Su trabajo es el transporte público. Tiene un motocarro propio desde hace 5 años, lo compró con el dinero que pudo ahorrar de sus trabajos eventuales. Desde entonces ha trabajado en esta actividad y por su gran habilidad puede obtener el dinero necesario para solventar los gastos familiares. Desea comprar otro motocarro para alquilarlo y de esta forma asegurar otro ingreso económico, lamentablemente considera por ahora que el préstamo solicitado no es conveniente para cumplir esa meta a corto plazo, es por eso que desea refaccionar su vehículo actual para que funcione bien.

Este es su primer crédito con MFP, por tanto agradece a todas las personas que lo hacen posible, para continuar con sus objetivos. Por otro lado, se compromete a ser una socia puntual y responsable en el pago de sus cuotas.
Con el monto solicitado, 1000 soles, renovará algunas piezas de su motocarro, mientras que otra parte del dinero lo ahorrará para comprarse otro vehículo más adelante.
texts.en:
Diego, 27, is good humored and has the energy typical of young entrepreneurs.  Every day he works hard to improve his quality of life.  He lives in his parents' house with them and his siblings.

He works in public transportation.  He has had his own three-wheeled vehicle for five years.  He bought it with the money he managed to save from his temporary jobs.  Since then he has had this job, and because of his great skills he can earn the money he needs to pay for his family expenses.  

He wants to buy another three-wheeled vehicle to rent out, thus ensuring more income.  Unfortunately, he thinks that for now the requested loan is not enough to realize this goal in the short term.  This is why he wants to refurbish his current vehicle so it will run well.

This is his first loan with MFP, so he is grateful to all the people who make it possible to continue with his goals.  He also promises to be a punctual and responsible member in making his payments.

With the requested amount, 1000 soles [PEN], he will renovate a few parts for his three-wheeled vehicle.  He will save some of the money to buy himself another vehicle later on.

loans.use: to renovate some parts for his three-wheeled vehicle

loans.name: Dora Stella

texts.es:
Dora anteriormente trabajó en un salón de belleza durante mucho tiempo, y gracias a la experiencia que adquirió, decidió montar su propio salón de belleza desde hace 5 meses. La principal dificultad que ha tenido en su negocio es la falta de capital, pero gracias al esfuerzo que hace diariamente, esta dificultad la ha venido superando poco a poco. Dora se encuentra casada y tiene 2 hijos de 10 y 13 años de edad, y gracias a su negocio aporta económicamente en su hogar para que puedan tener una mejor calidad de vida y mayores oportunidades económicas para progresar. Buscando satisfacer las necesidades sanitarias que le exigen, Dora busca un préstamo para realizar algunas mejoras locativas y cumplir con las exigencias sanitarias en su salón de belleza.

Su sueño es tener un gran salón de belleza donde pueda generar empleo para las personas más necesitadas y también poder tener mejores ingresos con los que su familia tenga la oportunidad de tener una mejor calidad de vida y sus hijos el acceso a una educación de mejor calidad.
texts.en:
Dora formerly worked in a beauty salon for a long time and thanks to the experience she acquired, finally decided to start her own beauty salon five months ago. The main difficulty she has had in her business is the lack of capital; however, thanks to the effort she puts forth daily, she has gradually been able to overcome this difficulty.

Dora is married and has two children, ages 10 and 13. Thanks to her business she contributes financially to her household so they can have a better quality of life and greater economic opportunities to succeed. Looking to meet the sanitary standards required, Dora is applying for a loan to make some improvements at the location and comply with sanitary standards in her beauty salon.

She dreams of having a great beauty salon where she can generate jobs for people in need and also earn a higher income so that her family will be able to enjoy a better quality of life and her children will have access to a better quality education.

loans.use: to make some improvements at her location and comply with sanitary requirements in her beauty salon.

loans.name: Bhagaban

texts.en:
Bhagaban is a 34-year-old differently able person living with his wife and three children. He owns a grocery shop where he sells rice, spices, edible oil, biscuits, wafers, etc. and earns 5,000 INR per month which is very little for a family of five persons to survive on. He has four years of experience in this business.

He has a plan to enhance his business by purchasing more stock of the products he sells and adding some additional products to his shop like electric bulbs, grains, detergents, soaps, wheat flour, etc. He wants to purchase the stock in bulk to increase his inventory and reduce his transportation and buying cost.

Bhagaban has requested a loan amount of 25,000 INR to purchase more rice, spices and other household consumables that he sells in his shop and some other above-mentioned additional products.

He has a dream to have his children study in a good school and give them all the necessities of life.

loans.use: to pay for purchasing more rice, detergents, spices and other house consumables for his grocery shop.

loans.name: Raghunath

texts.en:
Raghunath is a 40-year-old differently able person living with his two wives, two daughters and one son. He is engaged in the activity of selling fresh fish and dried fish. He purchases fish from fishermen and sells it in the market near his village. He travels long distances on his tricycle (cycle specially made for physically challenged persons) for purchasing fish which is very difficult for him. And even then, he is not able to purchase fish in bulk as he does not have any refrigerated container with him.

He wants to buy a motor bike with 4 wheels  which is specially made for physically challenged persons and wants to set up an ice box on his bike where he can keep his fresh fish and prevent them from spoiling. He has requested a loan amount of 40,000 INR for purchasing the bike with icebox and more stock of fish.

He has a dream to give a better life to his family and fulfill their basic needs.

loans.use: to pay for purchasing a motor bike (with 4 wheels) and for setting up an ice box on his bike where he can keep his raw fish and prevent them from spoiling.

loans.name: Ana Elizabeth

texts.es: Ana Elizabeth de 34 años de edad, posee una venta de tortillas en la cual se encarga de elaborarlas y venderlas, este negocios han  nacido con el deseo de poder mejorar la economía familiar, ya que en muchas ocasiones Ana junto a su esposo no  contaban con el dinero necesario para solventar todos los gastos del hogar y  los de sus hijos;  Es por esta razón que ella desea poder seguir creciendo  con el negocio que le ha brindado estabilidad económica a su familia. Ana solicita un préstamo a través del cual pueda comprar maíz por mayor, de manera que pueda obtenerlo a precios más accesible, así mismo comprar cilindros de gas propano con el fin de contar con una reserva de este último, Esto será de mucho ayuda para ella, ya que podrá mejorar las condiciones de su negocio y así contar con más clientela.
texts.en:
Ana Elizabeth, 34, has a shop where she makes and sells tortillas.  This business came from her desire to be able to improve the family finances, because many times Ana and her husband didn't have the money they needed to cover all the expenses for their household and their children.  For this reason she wants to continue growing with the business that has brought her family economic stability.

Ana is requesting a loan with which she can buy corn wholesale, so she can get it at more affordable prices.  She also will buy cylinders of propane gas to have some in reserve.  This will be a big help to her because she'll be able to improve the conditions of her business and have more customers.

loans.use: to buy corn to make tortillas

loans.name: Sergio Eudoro

texts.es:
SERGIO TIENE 70 AÑOS ES CASADO VIVE CON LA ESPOSA EN CHIMBO.

SE DEDICA A LA AGRICULTURA A LA COMPRAR DE MAIZ, TRIGO Y CEBADA ADEMAS SE DEDICA A LA VENTA DE GRANOS.
EL DIENRO DEL CREDITO NECESITA PARA INVERTIR EN FERTILIZANTES, ABONOS, PLAGUICIDAS Y FUNGUICIDAS.EL DIENRO LE AYUDADO A INVERTIR EN LOS GRANOS Y EN LOS CULTIVOS PARA TENER MAS GANANCIAS.

EL SUEÑO DE SERGIO ES INCREMENTAR LAS VENTAS PARA MEJORAR LA CALIDAD DE VIDA Y EL NEGOICIO.

EN LOS TIEMPOS LIBRES LE GUSTA CAMINAR CON LA ESPOSA POR EL CAMPO.
texts.en:
Sergio is 70 years old, married, and lives with his wife in Chimbo.  

He works in agriculture buying corn, wheat, and barley.  He also sells grains.  He needs the loan money to investí in fertilizers, manure, pesticidas and fungicides.  The money will help him investí in his grains and crops to have better earnings.  

Sergio’s dream is to increase his sales and better his quality of life and his business.  

In his free time he likes to take walks with his wife in the countryside.

loans.use: buy fertilizers, manure, pesticides, and fungicides.

loans.name: Sudersan

texts.en:
Sudersan is 32 years old, a differently able person living with his parents and his younger brother aged 21 years. He has a tea and food stall in his village. He sells tea, some local snacks like 'samosa' (fried dough stuffed with potato curry), 'idli' (a popular recipe of south Indian origin made by steaming a batter consisting of fermented black lentils and rice), 'wada' (lentil doughnuts) etc. and earns 3500 INR, which is used for his household expenditures. His brother is working as a labourer and helps Sudersan in his business to purchase the raw materials. 

He wants to repair his food stall and purchase some furniture (benches, a table) to seat his customers and utensils like plates, spoons, etc., which will attract the customers and will increase his monthly income. 

He has requested a loan of 20,000 INR to fulfil his above requirements. He says in this way he can earn 4000 to 5000 INR per month and would be able to construct a house and get married.

loans.use: to pay for purchasing utensils and furniture to seat his customers at his food stall.

loans.name: Judhistira

texts.en:
Judhistira is a 35-year-old physically challenged person living with his father, wife and two children. He owns and manages a variety store where he sells men’s and women’s slippers (footwear), kerosene oil (cooking and lighting fuel), detergents, betel, toothpaste, toothbrushes, etc. and earns 2,000 INR per month, which is not sufficient for a family of five persons. 

He has a plan of expanding his business by adding more stock of the goods he has and some additional products like biscuits, chocolates, wafers, bathing soap and some stationery items. He also wants to renovate his shop so that his client base increases.

He has requested a loan amount of 20,000 INR for renovating his shop and purchasing the above-mentioned items. He has a dream of having his children well educated and giving his family a quality life.

loans.use: to pay for purchasing detergents, betel, toothpaste,kerosene oil (cooking and lighting fuel), soap, chocolates, etc. for his variety shop.

loans.name: Edwin

texts.es:
El socio Edwin pertenece al banco comunal VALLECITO,el socio continua con su negocio de carpinteria ,el socio lleva años en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada dia a su negocio,el socio elabora diferentes tipos de modelos de muebles,camas,armarios,comodas entre otros,el socio cuenta con un pequeño taller que se encuentra ubicado en su casa lugar donde elabora sus trabajos,el socio es una persona responsable y empeñoso siendo de esta manera que el socio saca adelante a su familia.
EL socio solicita el credito para la compra de madera.
El socio se siente agrade
texts.en: Edwin belongs to the Vallecito community bank. He continues with his carpentry business. He has years experience with this business which is going well thanks to the work he puts in every day. He makes different types of furniture models, beds, armoires, chests, among others. The partner has a small shop which is found in his house, a place where he makes his work. He is a responsible and hard working person and thus is getting his family ahead. He is requesting a loan to buy wood. He feels thankful.

loans.use: to buy wood.

loans.name: Vilma

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de horno panificadora,la socia vende panes,galletas y tortas,la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 8:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene 7 años en este negocio de horno panificadora,en sus tiempos libres a la socia le gusta preparar tortas paar sus hijos,el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de horno panificadora.La socia solicita le credito para comprar harina,azucar,leche y huevos para que prepare las tortas,pasteles y galletas.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member continues working in her bakery business.  She sells bread, cookies, and cakes, working from 8 a.m. until 8 p.m.  She has had her bakery oven for seven years.  In her free time she likes to make cakes for her children.  Her dream is to expand her bakery business.

She's requesting the loan to buy flour, sugar, milk, and eggs to make cakes, pastries, and cookies.

The member is happy about the loan and promises to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy ingredients to make cakes, pastries, and cookies

loans.name: Kamala Lochan

texts.en:
Kamala Lochan is a 32-year-old, differently able person living with his parents, one brother aged 27, his wife aged 28, one son aged 7 and his daughter aged 4. He is the only earning person in his family. He has a variety shop in his home. He has 4 years of experience in this field. He earns 6000 INR in a month by selling packaged food items like biscuits, chocolate, spices, betel, soap, detergent, etc.  This is not sufficient for him to manage his family expenses.  To grow his business he needs some financial support. 

He has applied for a loan of 25,000 INR to add grocery items to his shop. He wants to purchase pickles, rice, lentils, cooking oil, toothpaste, and toothbrushes to add to his inventory so that he can earn 6,500 to 7,000 INR per month from this business. He hopes to build a house for his family and send his children to a good school.

loans.use: to pay for purchasing pickles, rice, lentils, cooking oil, toothpaste, toothbrushes, etc. for his variety shop.

loans.name: Fernando

texts.es:
El socio se sigue dedicando al negocio de agencia de viajes,el socio es guia de turismo y presta servicios de turismo como al valle sagrado o machupicchu,el socio ya se dedica 15 años en este negocio y a el gustaria tener una agencia de viajes,el sueño del socio es que sus hijos estudien y sean profesionales.El socio solicita el credito para comprar su material de trabajo como carpas,utensilios y herramientas para su trabajo.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Fernando contiues working in a travel agency. He is a tourist guide and offers tourism services like the Sacred Valley or Machu Picchu. He has been working for 15 years in this business and he would like to have a travel agency. His dream is that his children study and become professionals. 

Fernando is asking for this loan to buy materials such as tents, utensils and tools for his business. 

Fernando is happy about this loan and promises to fulfill the monthly payments.

loans.use: to buy materials for his business such as tents, utensils and tools.

loans.name: Jairo Alberto

texts.es:
Jairo es una persona muy trabajadora y gracias a esto ha logrado salir adelante a pesar de las grandes dificultades que se le han presentado en la vida. Jairo es odontólogo y desde hace unos 8 años se viene desempeñando en esta actividad, y gracias a su esfuerzo y dedicación en el trabajo, desde hace 4 años logró montar su propio consultorio odontológico. A pesar del poco capital con el que cuenta, su esfuerzo le ha permitido superar grandes obstáculos que se le han presentado en su negocio, y esto le ha permitido seguir saliendo adelante y buscando cada vez más mejores oportunidades económicas para su familia. Intentando superar la dificultad de capital que tiene, Jairo busca un préstamo para comprar materias primas como siliconas, recinas, algodones, entre otros más para seguir ofreciendo un buen servicio a sus clientes.

Su mayor sueño es poder separar su consultorio odontológico de su casa y así ofrecerles una mejor atención a sus clientes. Además, podrá ofrecer una mejor calidad de vida a su familia y tendrá la oportunidad de seguir progresando junto a ellos.
texts.en:
Jairo is a very hardworking person, thanks to which he has succeeded in getting ahead despite the great difficulties he has confronted in his life. Jairo is a dentist and has been engaged in this profession for the past 8 years. Thanks to his effort and dedication to his work he succeeded in opening his own dental office four years ago. Despite having little capital, his hard work enabled him to overcome the great obstacles he has encountered in his business and this has allowed him to continue moving forward while always looking for improved economic opportunities for his family. With the goal of solving his capital requirements, Jairo is requesting a loan to purchase basic supplies such as silicone, resin and cotton, among other items, in order to continuing providing the best service to his patients.

His greatest dream is to be able to separate his dental office from his house and thus provide better care to his patients. As well, he would be able to provide his family a better quality of life and have the opportunity to continue succeeding along with them.

loans.use: to purchase basic supplies, such as silicone, resins and cotton, among other items, in order to continue offering good care to his patients.

loans.name: Teresa

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de tienda de abarrotes,la socia vende productos de primera necesidad como arroz,azucar,leche y galletas,la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m,la socia es una mujer emprendedora que el sueño que tiene es que sus hijos terminen de estudiar y sean profesionales,la socia ya tiene 5 años en este negocio,en sus tiempos libres a la socia le gusta salir con sus hijos a pasear.La socia solicita el credito para comprar arroz,azucar,leche y galletas al por mayor.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member continues to be dedicated to her grocery store business. She sells basic necessity products like rice, sugar, milk and cookies. She works from 8AM until 7PM. She is an enterprising woman. The dream that she has is that her children finish their education and become professionals. She already has five years with this business. In her free time, the member likes to go out with her children to walk. She is requesting a loan to buy rice, sugar, milk and cookies at wholesale.

She is happy for the loan and promises to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, milk, and cookies at wholesale.

loans.name: María Inés

texts.es: María Inés se dedica a un trabajo muy duro el cual es la comercialización de mariscos como: cangrejos, diferentes tipos de camarones, pescado, conchas y otras más, su venta la realiza de forma ambulante yendo a distintos pueblos donde día tras días ofrece sus productos por diferentes colonias. Ella vive junto a su esposo quien trabaja de la misma manera todo con el mismo fin en común que es el de darles todo lo necesario a sus tres hijos. María es muy responsable con su hogar por lo que solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL,  por medio del cual pueda comprar mayor cantidad de mariscos y así mismo atender encargos hechos por sus clientes a quienes desea cumplirles para siempre contar con ellos y de estar forma ser referida a otras personas tomando en cuenta su responsabilidad y frescura de sus productos.
texts.en:
María Inés is in a very hard line of work which is the sale of seafood such as: crab, different types of shrimp, fish, shellfish and other types of seafood.  She is a traveling sales woman and goes to different towns on a daily basis where she offers her products in various neighborhoods.  

María Inés lives with her husband, who does similar work and shares the common goal of giving their three children all of the necessities.  She is also very responsible with her home.  

María is requesting this loan in order to purchase larger quantities of seafood, and therefore be able to fulfill orders from her clients.  This will ensure that they can count on her and will recommend her to other clients due to her responsibility and the freshness of her products.

loans.use: to buy crabs, shrimp and fish to sell.

loans.name: Shirley

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de hamburguesas,la socia vende en forma ambulatoria,la socia trabaja desde las 7:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.,la socia ya tiene 8 años en este negcoio,en sus tiempos libres la socia le gusta pasear con su hijo,el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender las hamburguesas.La socia solicita el credito para comprar carne,panes,pollo y papas para que prepare las hamburguesas.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Shirley continues to work at her business selling hamburgers as a street vendor.  She works from 7:00am until 5:00pm.  She has had this business for eight years.  

In her free time, she likes to spend time with her son.  Her dream is to have a store where she can sell hamburgers.  She is asking for this loan to purchase meat, bread, chicken, and potatoes to prepare hamburgers.

Shirley is happy to receive this loan and promises to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to purchase meat, bread, chicken, and potatoes to prepare hamburgers.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
María tiene 53 años, es una mujer luchadora, está casada con Juan, con quien tiene cuatro hijos, de los cuales, ahora sólo dos están a su cargo: Estefany y Jovana. La casa donde viven la alquilan desde hace 3 años.  
Hace 6 que se dedica a la agricultura y a la ganadería. En sus propios terrenos agrícolas siembra papa, maíz y habas, las cuales fertilizan, cuida y cosecha con mucho esmero, pues sabe que obtendrá la recompensa durante la venta en el mercado de la ciudad. Cuenta que ella misma traslada los productos para negociarlos, “tengo que aprovechar la venta y negociar a un mayor precio”, comenta. Asimismo, cría animales (cerdos y ovejas), los cuales engorda para luego vender su carne. Gracias a esta actividad obtiene ingresos estables para mantener los gastos familiares. 

Este es su tercer crédito con MFP y durante todo este tiempo logró avanzar en su negocio y adquirir ganancias para el futuro de sus hijos. Por esa razón, promete ser puntual en sus cuotas, pues le agrada ser parte de su grupo.
María invertirá el dinero de este préstamo en la compra de fertilizantes naturales para su próxima siembra.
texts.en:
María is 53 years old. She is a hard working woman. She is married to Juan with whom she has four children of whom only two are in her care: Estefany and Jovana. The house where they live has been rented for three years.

For six years she has been dedicated to farming and livestock. In her own farm land she plants potato, maize and lima bean which she fertilizes, takes care of and harvests with a lot of care since she knows that she will reap the reward when she sells in the city market. She herself transports the products to sell them, "I have to make the sale and negotiate a higher price, she comments. Additionally, she raises animals (pigs and sheep which she fattens to then sell their meat. Thanks to this activity, she makes stable income to support the family expenses.

This is her third loan with MFP and during all of this time, she has managed to advance her business and acquire earnings for the future of her children. For this reason, she promises to be punctual with her payments since she is thankful to be part of her group. Maria will invest the money from this loan in the purchase of natural fertilizers for her next planting.

loans.use: to buy natural fertilizers for her next planting.

loans.name: Diana Carolina

texts.es:
DIANA TIENE 20 AÑOS ES SOLTERA VIVE EN CHIMBO EN CASA DE LOS PADRES.

TRABAJAR EN UN GABINETE DE BELLEZA ES UN NEGOCIO PROPIO ES DINERO NECESITA PARA COMPRAR PRODUCTOS DE BELLEZA COMO CREMAS, TINTES Y MAQUILLAJE. EL DINERO LE AYUDADO A COMPRAR LAS COSAS EN EFECTIVO.

EL SUEÑO DE DIANA AUMENTAR EL NEGOCIO Y EN LOS TIEMPOS LIBRES SE DEDICA A ALFASBETIZAR A LAS PEROSNA QUE NO SABEN.
texts.en: Diana is twenty years old, single, and lives at her parents', in Chimbo. She works in a beauty salon of her own. She needs the money to buy beauty products such as creams, hair dyes, and make-up. With the money, she can buy those products in cash. Diana's dream is to improve her business. In her spare time, she teaches people to read and write.

loans.use: to buy creams, hair dyes, and make-up.

loans.name: Irma

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de jugos y tambien realiza fotocopias,la socia prepara diferentes jugos como jugo de papaya,de leche de naranja entre otros jugos,la socia tiene un pequeño local que esta en su casa y ahi atiende los jugos y las fotocopias,la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,el sueño de la socia es maplira el local donde vende jugos y fotocopias.La socia solicita le credito para comprar manzanas,naranjas,papaya para la prepararcion de jugos.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member continues to sell juices and make photocopies, she prepares different juices like papaya juice, orange juice and others. 

The member has a little store in her home where she makes the juices and photocopies, working from 8am to 6pm. 

Her dream is to grow the store where she prepares juices and photocopies. The member is requesting the loan to buy apples, oranges and papaya to prepare juices.

The member is happy to have the loan and is committed to making payments according to the schedule.

loans.use: to buy apples, oranges and papaya to make juices.

loans.name: Eleuteria

texts.es:
La socia Eleuteria tiene 53 años de edad,es casada y tiene 7 hijos,la socia se dedica al negocio de venta de comida,la socia vende pollo al horno,saltado,sopas y huevo frito,la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,la socia vende en forma ambulatoria,la socia ya tiene 7 años en este negocio,el sueño de la socia es tener un restaurant.La socia solicita el credito para comprar productos para cocinar como arroz,carne,pollo y verduras.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Eleuteria is 53 years old, married, and has seven children.  She works selling food.  She sells oven roasted chicken, stir-fried steak and potatoes, soups, and fried eggs.  She works from 8:00am until 6:00pm selling as a street vendor.  She has had this business for seven years.  Her dream is to have a restaurant.  

She is asking for this loan to purchase cooking ingredients such as rice, meat, chicken, and vegetables.

She is happy with this loan and promises to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to purchase cooking ingredients such as rice, meat, chicken, and vegetables.

loans.name: Elchin

texts.en:
Elchin, a single 21-year-old living with his parents in Agsu, Azerbaijan, is a blacksmith who makes doors and windows. With good experience and a good reputation in this field, he is well-known in his area.

Now requesting a loan of 1000 AZN from AqroInvest, a partner of Kiva, Elchin wants to purchase more metal to expand his business. This will help him satisfy the demand for his work.

loans.use: to buy more metal.

loans.name: Iveri

texts.en:
Iveri is 44 years old and lives in Khoni district with his family that includes his wife, two children, mother, brother, sister-in-law and niece. His wife sells newspapers locally from which she gets a monthly income. Iveri’s mother is provided with a retirement pension. The main source of income for the family is the agricultural business. Iyeri owns a plot of land, where he grows maize and nuts. Iveri has three greenhouses as well, where he grows tomatoes, greens and cucumbers. He sells all his agricultural products locally. Besides these activities, Iveri runs a small dairy farm. In particular, he has 4 milk cows and 2 calves. The family produces cheese and sells at the local open market.

Iveri is requesting a loan to build an additional greenhouse. He will purchase building materials to expand his greenhouse business. Iveri will sow more vegetables and greens and sell at a good price. This will increase the income of the family. With the increased income, Iveri plans to finance the education of his children and a niece. He awaits your support.

loans.use: to build a greenhouse.

loans.name: Anjali

texts.en:
Anjali is a 34-year-old widow living with her two daughters aged 16 and 15 years  and two sons aged 14 and 12 years. All her children are schooling. She is engaged in the activity of selling fresh and dried fish in the market and earns 2,000 INR per month. She buys fish directly from the local fishermen and sells some of them fresh and dries some of them to sell as dried fish. She sells 10 to 12 kg of fresh fish and 18-20 kg of dry fish by roaming door to door in the nearby villages.

She wants to establish a shop where she can sit and sell fish. She says that doing so she would be able to give time to her children and properly manage her family.

She has applied for a loan amount of 20,000 INR for setting up a shop and for purchasing more fish. She has a dream: to provide the best possible facilities to her children and give them a good education.

loans.use: to pay for purchasing more fish and furniture to keep in her shop.

loans.name: Sanjaya Kumar

texts.en:
Sanjaya Kumar is a physically challenged person aged 30. He lives with his parents, 3 brothers, his wife aged 28 and his only son aged 2 years. Sanjaya has been managing a variety shop for 12 years in his village. His shop is 800 metres from his home. His brothers are helping him to purchase the goods for his variety shop. He sells betel, packaged food (like biscuits, cakes, etc.), soaps of different brands, detergent, shampoo and fashion accessories (like talc powder, face wash, body lotion, etc.).  Because his is the only variety shop in his village all the villagers are depending on his shop, but he cannot meet the customers' demand.

Sanjaya requested a loan of 25,000 INR to purchase a refrigerator so he can sell cooled soft drinks and to add some goods in different brands from what he sells now.  And he wants to add some new varieties of products like cooking oil, lentils, noodles, etc. He hopes to make his family happy and provide better education by sending his son to a good school.

loans.use: to pay for purchasing betel, packaged foods (like biscuits, cakes, etc.), detergent, shampoo, fashion accessories and a refrigerator for cooling soft drinks in his variety store.

loans.name: Luis Alberto

texts.es:
El socio ALberto pertenece al banco comunal VALLECITO,el socio continua con su negocio de taxi,el socio cuenta con dos autos los cuales uno lo alquila y el otro el socio lo maneja brindando el servicio de Taxi ,el socio trabaja durante el dia desde las 06:00am hasta las 09:00pm aproximadamente todos los dias, a la vez el socio apoya economicamente a su esposa con su negocio de tienda de abarrotes,siendo de esta forma que el socio saca adelante a su familia,el socio es una persona responsable con muchas ganas de seguir trabajando por su familia.
EL socio solicita el credito para la compra de llantas para uno de sus autos.
El socio se siente agradecido por el credito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The member, Alberto, belongs to the communal bank "Vallecito". He still has a taxi business, and counts on two cars - one of which is for hire, and the other he uses to offer a taxi service. The member works from around 6am to 9pm everyday. 

At the same time, the member provides economic support to his wife and her grocery store, as this is how the member provides for his family. The member is a responsible person, who really wants to continue working for his family.

The member is requesting the loan to buy tyres for one of his cars.

The member is grateful for the offered loan and is committed to completing his payments according to schedule.

loans.use: to buy tyres for one of his cars.

loans.name: Jose Isaias

texts.es:
El señor Jose Isaias esta casado, tiene 33 años de edad, cursó el primer año de educación básica, tiene 4 hijos 3  de los cuales están estudiando, se dedica a la talabartería a la elaboración de zapatos, inicio este negocio con su padre y hasta el momento lleva 10 años de experiencia, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposa quien se dedica al mismo negocio.

Solicita un préstamo que lo utilizara para la ampliación de su negocio, en la compra de materia prima, específicamente para compra piel y suelas, espera seguir prosperando y en el futuro tener fuente de trabajo para otras personas.
texts.en:
Sr. Jose Isaias is married, 33 years old, and has had one year of primary school education. He has four children, three of whom are in school. He is a saddler and makes shoes. He started the business with his father and has had 10 years of experience. He has the help of his wife, who is also involved in the same business.

He is applying for a loan that he will use to expand his business. He will purchase basic materials, specifically leather and soles. He hopes to continue prospering and in the future to provide a source of jobs for other people.

loans.use: to purchase leather and soles.

loans.name: Rama

texts.en:
Rama is a 36-year-old widow living with her two sons aged 14 and 12 years. She runs and manages a ready-made garment shop where she sells garments for women and kids. She earns 5,000 INR per month from this business but that is not sufficient for her family. Her husband died six years ago and after that she was burdened by all her family’s responsibility, so she started her garments shop two years ago.

She wants to add some other product line to her shop like cosmetics so that more of her female customers could be attracted towards her shop and she wants to renovate her shop.

She has applied for a loan amount of 30,000 INR for purchasing more garments of new trend and fashion and some cosmetic items like face cream, deodorant talc, lipsticks, nail colors etc. for her shop; and to renovate her shop.

She has a dream: to have her children study in a good school and provide them all the basic necessities of life.

loans.use: to pay for purchasing garments of new trend and fashion and some cosmetics items like face cream, deodorant talc, lipsticks, nail colours etc. for her garment shop.

loans.name: Pramila

texts.en:
Pramila is a 21-year-old unmarried girl living with her parents and two brothers. She is engaged in running a variety store where she sells potatoes, tomatoes, grains, wheat flour, biscuits, kerosene oil (cooking and lighting fuel), bread, toffees, wafers, etc. Her father helps her in bringing stock for her shop from the market. She dropped out of school just to help her father financially and help him in managing her family.

She has requested a loan amount of 30,000 INR for repairing her shop and for purchasing more stock of the goods she sells. She has a dream: to have her brothers study in a good school and save some money for her marriage to reduce some burden from her father's shoulders.

loans.use: to pay for purchasing potatoes, tomatoes, grains, wheat flour, biscuits, kerosene oil (cooking and lighting fuel), bread, toffees, wafers, etc. and for  repairing her shop.

loans.name: Pratima

texts.en:
Pratima is a 33-year-old widow living with her daughters aged 9 and 12 years. She manages a sewing shop where she making bags from plastic and she stitches  dresses like salwars (traditional Indian dress) etc. for her customers who give orders for stitching. After her husband’s death she was burdened with her daughters' responsibility so she started a tailoring shop. She earns only 6,000 INR per month by making plastic bags and clothing in her business.

She has planned to purchase three new sewing machines so that she can enlarge her business and take orders from her customers in bulk.The demand for plastic bag is very high in her area, but she can not supply them according to the demand. She wants to purchase sewing machines and raw materials like plastic and thread, etc. in large amounts, so that she can meet the growing demand of the customers.   

She has requested a loan amount of 30,000 INR for purchasing three sewing machines, fabrics, plastic and thread. She also wants to hire some work force to help her. 

She wants both her daughters to study in a good school and to save some money for their future.

loans.use: to pay for purchasing three sewing machines and fabrics for her tailoring shop.

loans.name: Haydee

texts.es: Haydee vive junto a su compañero de vida Rafael, ella se dedica a la venta de productos para el cabello shampoo, acondicionador, cremas, ampolletas entre otros, tiene varios años con el negocio  y ya tiene mucha clientela pues las personas saben que todo lo que comercia es de primera calidad, a precios accesibles pero sobre todo con un excelente servicio, Haydee es una mujer emprendedora, activa y muy luchadora, siempre esta a la expectativa de oportunidades que le permitan forjarse un futuro mas prospero, es muy perseverante y no descansara hasta alcanzar el éxito, en los últimos meses aumento la demanda de sus productos y desea aprovechar este momento para realizar una nueva inversión y acrecentar el negocio, pero para ello necesita de capital que la respalde por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar shampoo, acondicionador, cremas, etc. Haydee tiene buenas referencias de pago y una moral intachable, asegura que podrá cancelar la deuda en el periodo establecido y a la vez tiene la certeza que le dará a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en:
Haydee lives with her life partner Rafael.  She works selling hair products such as shampoo, conditioner, hair creams, hair serums, and other items.  She has had this business for many years and has many customers since people know that everything she sells is of high quality at accessible prices and she provides excellent customer service.  Haydee is an enterprising, determined, and active woman who is always looking for opportunities that will allow her to forge a more prosperous future.  She is very persevering and doesn't rest until she succeeds. 

In the last few months, demand has risen for her products and she wants to take advantage of this opportunity to make a new investment and grow her business.  To do this, she needs capital, so she has requested a loan from INTEGRAL to purchase shampoo, conditioner, hair creams, and other items. Haydee has good payment references and strong morals.  She is sure that she can cancel the debt in the established time frame and at the same time provide her family with a full life.

loans.use: to purchase shampoo, conditioner, and hair creams.

loans.name: Aurelia

texts.es: LA SRA. AURELIA TIENE 58 AÑOS DE EDAD, ES UNA MUJER CASADA,  DESDE HACE UN PAR DE AÑOS SE DEDICA A LA VENTA DE PLATILLOS DE COMIDA, LOS CUALES PREPARA ELLA MISMA EN SU DOMICILIO. SU ESPOSO ES UN HOMNRE YA JUBILADO EL CUAL RECIBE SU PENSION CADA MES. AURELIA TIENE EL PROPOSITO DE INVERTIR EN LA COMPRA DE MAS INGREDIENTES  PARA SU NEGOCIO Y ASI PODER OFRECERLE A SUS CLIENTES MAS VARIEDAD, YA QUE ELLA DESEA PODER AUMENTAR SUS INGRESOS Y ASI PODER AYUDAR A SU MARIDO CON LOS GASTOS DE SU FAMILIA. POR ESTA RAZON ELLA SOLICITA EL CREDITO PARA PODER INVERTIR MAS LA COMPRA DE MERCANCIA PARA SU NEGOCIO.
texts.en: Aurelia, 58, is married and for a couple of years has been selling food dishes which she prepares herself and sells from her home. Her husband is retired and receives a monthly pension. Aurelia intends to invest in the purchase of more ingredients for her business so that she can offer her customers more variety, which will enable her to increase revenue and help her husband with the family expenses. This is why she has applied for a loan, which she will invest in the purchase of more products for her business.

loans.use: to invest in the purchase of merchandise for her business

loans.name: Maria Doly

texts.es: Muy buenas tardes le presento a María una mujer emprendedora que con los deseos de mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia emprendió su propio negocio, donde hace más de 11 años que se dedica a la venta de comida, esta actividad lo realiza a reparto. A sus 45 años María ha cumplido algunos de sus sueños como mejorar su vivienda y mantener su negocio. Su mayor deseo es de comprarse una moto donde pueda transportar sus comidas. El crédito que solicito lo destinara para la compra de insumos como arroz, azúcar, leche, y fideos y así poder preparar sus comidas. María es conviviente y tiene 02 hijos, actualmente sigue apoyando  a 01 de ellos. Se siente feliz y agradece a los prestamistas Kiva por ayudar a personas como ella.
texts.en:
Good Afternoon, we are introducing María, an enterprising women who wishes to improve her family's quality of life through her own business. She has sold food for 11 years, which she delivers. 

At 45 years of age, María has fulfilled several of her dreams, like improving her home and maintaining her business. Her greatest desire is to buy a motorbike so she can transport her meals. 

The loan she is requesting will be used to buy ingredients, like rice, sugar, milk and noodles, so she can prepare meals. María is co-habiting and has two children, one of whom she is still supporting. 

She is happy and grateful to Kiva loan givers for the help they give to people like her.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, milk and noodles.

loans.name: Nazirjon

texts.ru:
Назирчону 41 год, женат, отец троих детей. Он проживает в районе Спитамен. Назирчон живет с женой. Жена Назирчона домохозяйка. Назирчон 1994 году начал свою деятельность, стараясь обеспечить свою семью. Он занялся купле-продажей мелко - рогатого скота. Благодаря настойчивости и упорному труду, Назирчон сумел расширить свою деятельность и увеличить поголовья скота, получая хорошую прибыль. На сегодняшний день он разводит крупнороготый скот. Еще у него имеется лошадь, которая помогает ему в хозяйстве.
Назирчон просит кредит для закупа бычков.
texts.en:
Nazirjon is a 41-year-old married father of three. He lives in the Spitamen region with his wife, who is a homemaker. 

In 1994, Nazirjon started his own business, trying to provide for his family. He worked in sheep and goat trade. Thanks to persistent work, Nazirjon was able to expand his business, increase the number of livestock he owns, and make a good profit. 

Nazirjon currently breeds cattle, and he also owns a horse that helps with farming. He is requesting this loan to buy young bulls.

loans.use: to purchase young bulls

loans.name: María Gladis

texts.es: María Gladis vive junto a su compañero de vida Alfredo, ella se dedica a la compra y venta de ropa para damas, caballeros y niños, posee en variedad y de todo estilo, faldas, pantalones, vestidos, camisas entre otros, comercia de forma ambulante en las zonas aledañas a la comunidad donde reside, ya tiene mucha clientela fija que la prefiere porque siempre tiene lo que necesitan a precios realmente accesibles además el servicio es excelente; María es una mujer enérgica, luchadora y motivada a salir adelante, su mas grande meta es alcanzar el éxito y no piensa rendirse hasta lograrlo, pues la perseverancia es su mayor secreto, en las ultimas semanas se decidió a realizar una nueva inversión, pues sus ventas han mejorado y piensa que puede aprovechar el momento pero necesita de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar ropa por mayor. María Gladis tiene buenas referencias de pago es muy responsable y asegura que podrá cancelar la deuda, al mismo tiempo que mejorara la vida de su familia.
texts.en:
María Gladis lives with her long term partner, Alfredo, she buys and sells clothes for ladies, gentlemen and children and has a large variety in every style, skirts, trousers, vests and shirts among others. She sells them by travelling around to neighbouring communities and already has a fixed customer base, which she likes because she always has what they need at accessible prices, as well as provided excellent service.

María is an energetic women, determined and motivated to succeed, her greatest goal is to be successful and she has no intention of giving up before she achieves it - perseverance is her greatest secret. In recent weeks she has decided to take on a new investment as her sales have improved and she thinks that she should take advantage of this moment, but she needs capital which is why she has requested a loan from INTEGRAL to be able to buy wholesale clothing. 

María Gladis has good payment references, is very responsible and is certain that she can pay off the debt as well as improving her family's lives.

loans.use: to buy wholesale clothing.

loans.name: Roberto

texts.es:
EL socio Roberto pertenece al banco comunal VALLECITO,el socio continua trabajando como maestro constructor ,el trabaja realizando viviendas,carreteras,colegios de acuerdo a las obras que soliciten sus servicios,el socio lleva años en este trabajo el cual mediante este el socio saca adelante a su familia,el socio es una persona responsable y empeñoso siendo asi que el socio desea seguir trabajando para brindar lo mejor a su familia.
El socio solicita el credito para pagar un terreno que adquirio hace poco.
El socio se siente agradecido por el credito otorgado y se compromete acumplir con sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Roberto belongs to the communal bank VALLECITO. He continues working as a master builder, building houses, roads and schools according to the work requested by his services. He has been working many years in this business which allows him to get his family ahead. He is a responsible and hard-working person. He hopes to continue working to provide the best for his family. 

Roberto is asking for this loan to pay for a plot of land that he has recently purchased.

He is grateful for this loan granted and promises to fulfill his monthly payments by the deadline.

loans.use: to pay for the plot of land that he has recently purchased.

loans.name: Lidia

texts.es:
La socia Lidia pertenece al banco comunal VALLECITO ,la socia continua con su negocio de carpinteria,la socia lleva años en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada dia a su negocio ,la socia elabora camas,armarios,veladores entre otros,la socia vende de forma independiente a pedido de sus clientes que le solicitan, a la vez vende en las ferias de los fines de semana en un mercado local,la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa siendo de esta manera que ella saca adelante a su familia.
La socia solicita el credito para la compra de madera al por mayor.
La socia se siente agradecida por el credito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The member, Lidia, belongs to the communal bank VALLECITO. She still has a carpentry business, she has been running this business for years and it is going well thanks to the effort that she puts in everyday.

The member makes beds, wardrobes, candle holders and others. She sells them independently according to client orders, she also sells them at local markets on the weekends. The member is a responsible and hard working person, using this work to help her family succeed.

The member is asking for this loan to buy wholesale wood.

The member is grateful for the offered loan and committed to repaying it according to the agreed schedule.

loans.use: to buy wholesale wood.

loans.name: Pet's Group

texts.en:
Pet, aged 47 years, is married and has four children, one of whom is dependent on her and in school. She lives in a rural area of the Kror Kor district’s Pursat province in Cambodia. She and her husband have earned a living through farming rice on 2 hectares of farmland for more than 20 years and work as paid workers to complement the family’s income. The current business earns them about 13,000 Cambodian riels (KHR) per day and allows them to save about KHR 4,000 each day after offsetting their daily expenses. However, drought is the main challenge for her field business.

Pet’s group consists of three members who live in the same village. She is in her fourth microloan with VisionFund. The past three loans have helped her better support her family. Now, she is leading her group to request a loan with VisionFund. As the leader, she is going to use her portion to buy fertilizers for her farmland, and will use a portion of it to spend on labor. She hopes to increase her income from the rice paddy so as to improve her standard of living and keep her child in school.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers for her farmland and pay for labor.

loans.name: Olga

texts.ru:
Ольга занимается мелким предпринимательством в сфере торговли. Она торгует недорогой женской одеждой на центральном рынке города. Торговая точка находится у нее в собственности. Опыт работы составляет 8 лет. 
Ольга надеется вложить предложенные КИВОЙ средства в размере 10 000 гривен в закупку сезонной женской одежды, а именно юбок, брюк, кофт и халатов. За счет полученной от торговли прибыли Ольга хочет улучшать условия семейного быта.
texts.en:
Olga has a small business selling inexpensive women's clothing at the central city market. She owns her clothing stall and has 8 years of work experience. 

Olga hopes to invest the proposed 10,000 griven loan from Kiva to purchase seasonal women's clothing, specifically, skirts, pants, jackets, and robes. She wants to use the profits to improve her family's standard of living.

loans.use: to purchase seasonal women's clothing for sale

loans.name: Teresa

texts.es: Teresa de cincuenta y nueve años de edad vive junto a sus dos hijas; ella posee una tortillería en el lugar de su residencia, tiene varios años con el negocio y eso le ha regalado mucha experiencia en las ventas, es muy conocida en la zona y ya tiene mucha clientela pues las tortillas que comercia son calientitas y elaboradas con material de primera calidad además de los buenos precios y el servicio mas rápido; Teresa es una mujer activa con muchas ganas de salir adelante, trabaja muy duro día con día para alcanzar el éxito, en las ultimas semanas tuvo algunas perdidas pero desea recuperarse, quiere realizar una nueva inversión por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar maíz por mayor, leña, etc. Teresa tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable, asegura que podrá saldar la deuda en el periodo establecido y al mismo tiempo le ofrecerá a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Teresa is 59 years old and lives together with her two daughters. She owns a tortilla shop located in her home. She has spent several years on this business and this has given her lots of experience in sales. She is very well known in the area and now she has many customers because the tortillas that she sells are warm, are made with top quality materials, are well priced and her service is the fastest. Teresa is a very active woman with a lot of desire to get ahead. She works very hard every day to achieve success. En the last few weeks she had a few losses but she seeks to recover and she wants to complete a new investment. Because of this, she sought a loan from Integral that will permit her to buy mainly corn and wood, etc. Teresa has good payment references and is very responsible. She assures that she will discharge the debt in the established period and at the same time it will offer her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase mainly corn, and wood.

loans.name: Winnie

texts.en:
Winnie is 50 years old. She is a single lady and is blessed with four children. She does mixed farming and also buys avocados from other farmers at a wholesale price and then sells them in an open-air market. She has done so for the last seven years with the monthly income of 6,000 Kenyan shillings (KES), which she uses to support her family. 

She is applying for her first business loan from KADET LTD after being introduced by a KADET staff member. She will use the loan to buy more stock of avocados from the farmers for sale. 

With the anticipated profit from the business, she will educate her children and expand her business. Her hopes and dreams are to support and improve the living standards of the family.

loans.use: to buy avocados to sell.

loans.name: Feliciano

texts.es:
El señor Feliciano  tiene 35 años de edad está casado hace 15 años, tienen 4 hijos juntos.
El señor Feliciano es  muy trabajador, se dedica a la pulida de pisos desde hace 10 años, con mucho sacrificio y esfuerzo ha podido comprar la maquinaria para poder realizar su trabajo de forma eficiente y rápido. También cuenta con otro negocio que es una despensa  en su domicilio.
El crédito solicitado sería para la compra de productos necesarios para su trabajo como detergentes, soda caustica, ceras etc que le harán posible seguir garantizando la calidad de su servicio. Asimismo, en otra etapa desea comprar maquinarias para poder progresar cada día mas.
texts.en: Feliciano is 35, has been married for 15 years, and has 4 children with his wife. Feliciano is a hard worker and has polished floors for 10 years. With a lot of hard work and sacrifice, he was able to purchase the machinery necessary to do his work quickly and efficiently. He also has another business, which is a grocery store in his home. The loan he is requesting is to purchase the necessary products for his work, such as detergent, caustic soda, waxes, etc, that will make it possible for him to continue guaranteeing the quality of his service. Additionally, in another stage, he’d like to purchase machinery to be able to progress more and more each day.

loans.use: purchase floor polishing supplies including detergents, caustic soda, and waxes

loans.name: Vorn's Group

texts.en:
Living in a thatched roof house in the Moung Russey district’s Battambang province in Cambodia, Vorn is 37 years old. She is married with two dependent children, one daughter and one son, both of whom are still in school. To support the family, she has been involved in rice farming and hairdressing for four years, while her husband works as a paid construction worker to earn additional income. The current business earns her about 18,000 Cambodian riels (KHR) per day and allows her to save about KHR 10,000 each day after deducting daily expenses. 

Vorn’s group consists of three members who are all females who live in the same village. This is the fifth loan for her with VisionFund. The past loans have helped her relieve her family’s burden and improved their livelihood. Now, she is leading her group to seek a new loan with VisionFund. She is going to use her portion to buy fertilizers and pay for labor costs to plow her farmland. She will also use a portion of the loan to buy more hairdressing materials. Vorn hopes to increase her income from the current business to improve her standard of living and keep her children in school.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers and plow her farmland.

loans.name: Heidi

texts.es:
Heidi tiene 27 años, vive con su madre y su hermana en una casa alquilada desde hace 2 años.  
Ella estudió psicología, en la actualidad trabaja como asesora familiar en un albergue de su localidad. Gusta mucho de su trabajo, pues comparte muchas cosas con sus colegas y con los niños a los que ayuda. Pasa la mayor parte del día en su trabajo, ahí comenzó hace algunos años a vender ropa y productos de belleza a sus colegas; “hacen sus pedidos y me pagan la mitad, cuando entrego la prenda me pagan lo restante”, comenta. En estos meses tiene más pedidos, por lo que la falta el capital de trabajo para continuar, es así que acude a MFP.

Este es su segundo crédito con MFP y se siente tranquila por el apoyo que recibe, además de agradecer la confianza que le dan, prometiendo cumplir con sus cuotas de manera puntual, pues no defraudará a su grupo, conformado por personas solidarias y responsables.
Heidi invertirá este dinero en la compra de ropa y cosméticos, en grandes cantidades, para abastecer a su clientela.
texts.en: Heidi is twenty-seven, lives with her mother and her sister in a house they have been renting for two years. She studied psychology and now works as a family counselor in a shelter in her town. She likes her work very much, because she shares a lot with her colleagues and the children she helps. She spends the majority of her time at work. She started selling clothes and beauty products to her colleagues a few years ago. She says they pay half upon ordering and the other half when they receive the product. The number of orders has been growing, but she lacks the capital to meet them, and that is why she approached field partner MFP. This is her second loan with MFP; she feels more certain about the future with the field partner's backing. She thanks everyone in her group for the trust they place in her, and promises to make her repayments on time, because she does not want to abuse her group's confidence, since all the members are united and responsible. Heidi will use this money to buy clothes and cosmetics in great quantities in order to meet her customers' orders.

loans.use: to buy clothes and cosmetics in great quantities in order to meet her customers' orders.

loans.name: San Cayetano Group

texts.es:
El comité “San Cayetano" esta compuesto por 11 integrantes, el grupo empezó demostrando unión y solidaridad entre las compañeras quienes ya cuentan con sus actividades productivas propias.Las  integrantes han demostrado mucho interes por el programa ya que con un trabajo digno por mas pequeña que parezca ser ellas demuestran que pueden cumplir con sus metas.
Una de las integrantes la señora Felicia se encarga de la cría de animales. Ella es la encargada de alimentar a los animales con alimentos balanceados, de pasearlos y luego meterlos en los corrales para que descansen. 
El crédito solicitado sería para comprar mejor calidad de alimentos balanceados para dar a los animales.
texts.en:
The "San Cayetano" communal bank is made up of 11 members, the group started to show solidarity and unity between the members who all have their own productive businesses. 

The members have shown a lot of interest in the programme and decent work, since, as small as it seems to be, they are showing that they can achieve their goals.

One of the members, Felicia raises livestock. She feeds the animals with balanced feed, walks them and then puts them in the enclosures to rest.

The loan that she requested would be to buy better quality feed to give the animals.

loans.use: to buy balanced feed.

loans.name: Sokha's Group

texts.en:
A resident from a rural village in the Moung Russey district of Battambang province in Cambodia, Sokha is a 32-year-old married mother of two sons, both of whom are dependent on her and still in school. To sustain the family’s needs, she has been sowing mushrooms for two years. 

Sokha has been with VisionFund for three loan cycles and completely paid back the past loans. Her fellow group member is just in the first loan cycle as a client with VisionFund. Sokha used the past loan to better support her mushroom business. She is now leading her group of two to ask for a loan. As the group leader, she is going to use her portion to build a shelter for seeding the mushrooms. She hopes to increase her income from the current business to improve her standard of living and keep her children in school.

loans.use: To build a shelter for seeding the mushrooms.

loans.name: Ny's Group

texts.en:
Ny is aged 41 years and married. She lives in a rural area located in the Thmor Koul district of the Battambang province in Cambodia. She has two children. To support the family, she has been growing cabbages for 20 years and supplementing the family’s income by selling vegetables such as cabbages, eggplants, carrots, etc. Lack of working capital to support her current business is still the main challenge.

Ny’s group consists of two members who live in the same village, and this is the third loan for her group with Kiva’s partner, VisionFund. The past two loans have supported her family with sufficient food. Now, she is applying for a loan with VisionFund. She is going to use her portion to buy fertilizer for planting her cabbages, and she will use a portion of loan to buy more vegetables for selling. She hopes to increase her income from the current business to improve her lifestyle.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer for planting her cabbages.

loans.name: Eustaquio

texts.es:
Eustaquio, estaba casado pero hace más de tres años se separó de su esposa , tiene dos hijos que ya son independientes, vive en casa propia ocupando solo una habitación con paredes de ladrillo y el piso de tierra, la casa esta ubicada en la zona Alto Tacagua de la ciudad de La Paz.
El estudió solo hasta la primaria pero pudo aprender el oficio de sastre  y actualmente percibe ingresos ya que se dedica  a la confección de chamarras, trabajando por más de diez horas al día para posteriormente venderlas de forma ambulante ya que no cuenta con un puesto fijo.
El crédito lo requiere para la compra de material, tela, forro, cierres,  etc., para la confección de sus productos ya que desea mejorar sus ingresos por que debe cubrir los gastos de alimentación y pago de servicios básicos.
El sueño de Eustaquio, es ampliar su taller y tener un puesto de venta fijo ya que vender de forma ambulante es muy sacrificado.
Es la décima segunda vez que solicita crédito junto a IMPRO y la primera vez con KIVA.
texts.en:
Eustaquio is married, but he separated from his wife three years ago.  He has two children who are now independent.  He lives in his own house, occupying only one room with brick walls and a dirt floor.  The house is in the Alto Tacagua zone of the city of La Paz.

He only has an elementary school education, but he was able to learn the occupation of being a tailor.  He now gets income from making jackets.  He works for over ten hours a day in order to later sell them.  He sells in an itinerant manner because he does not have a fixed stand.

The loan that he needs is to buy materials like fabric, lining, and zippers, etc. to make his products.  He wishes to improve his income because he needs to cover the food expenses and pay for basic services.

Eustaquio’s dream is to expand his workshop and to have a fixed sales stand.  This is because selling in an itinerant manner is very hard work.

This is the 12th time he has requested a loan with IMPRO and the first time with Kiva.

loans.use: to buy  fabric, lining, zippers, and other supplies for his business of making jackets.

loans.name: Gs La Estrella Group

texts.es:
Doña Carmenza es un señora muy trabajadora dedicada a su trabajo, madre de tiene 3 hijos los cuales son menores de edad y le ayudan en sus negocios. Tiene su negocio en su casa de habitación en el sur de Honduras. Desde hace más de 10 años se dedica a Lo que es la venta de golosinas.
Doña Carmenza El préstamo lo necesita para la compra de refrescos, condimentos, carnes y otros, Este crédito le ayudara ya que tendrá capital fresco para invertir.  Ya que ella también da crédito a sus clientes.
Doña Carmenza sus sueños son de poder darles a sus hijos una educación de calidad. 
Maribel se dedica a la venta de ropa usada desde hace mas de 4 años y actualmente vive con su esposo.
Surit se dedica a su negocio propio venta de ropa usada desde hace más de 8 años.
Choluteca, Honduras - Agosto del 2012
texts.en:
Carmenza is a very hard working and dedicated woman and mother of 3 young children who help in her work. 

She has a business at her home in the south of Honduras. For more than 10 years she is sold snacks.

The loan that she needs is for buying drinks, condiments, meats and other things, the loan will help her as she will have fresh capital to invest as she also sells on credit to her customers.

Her dream is to give her children a quality education.

Maribel has sold used clothes for over four years and lives with her husband.

Surit has sold used clothes for over 8 years.

Choluteca, Honduras - August 2012.

loans.use: to buy drinks, condiments, meats, etc. for their business.

loans.name: Olga

texts.ru:
Ольга – рыночный предприниматель. Она уже около 14 лет работает на базаре, реализуя женскую одежду. За годы работы в этом секторе она смогла выкупить торговое место, что помогает ей существенно экономить на аренде на данном этапе. Самые продаваемые из ее группы это блузы, кофты, свитера. 
Ольге необходима дополнительная сумма в размере 10 000 гривен для того, чтобы закупить сезонную женскую одежду на осень-зиму. Ольге – 50 лет. Она не всегда может надеяться на получение кредита в местных кредитных учреждениях, так как там неохотно дают кредиты людям предпенсионного возраста. Поэтому кредиты КИВА стали настоящим решением проблемы для Ольги и однозначно находкой для развития ее бизнеса.
texts.en:
Olga is a 50-year-old entrepreneur who has worked for 14 years selling women's clothing at a market. After years of work in this sector, she was able to buy a market stall, which significantly helps her save money on rent at the moment. Her best selling items are blouses, jackets, and sweaters. 

Olga needs an additional 10,000 griven in order to purchase women's fall and winter clothing. She cannot always count on getting a loan from local loan institutions because they are reluctant to give loans to people approaching retirement age. Therefore, a Kiva loan is a real solution for Olga's problem and naturally, a godsend for the development of her business.

loans.use: to purchase seasonal women's clothing for fall and winter

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy perfumes, cosmetics and lotions.

loans.name: Edjiwengatuwa Ii Group

texts.es:
El comité Edijiwengatuwa II esta conformado por cinco mujeres menores de edad de la comunidad indígena Ache. Estas jóvenes al ser menores de edad son sus padres los que figuran como co-deudores, de igual forma este trabajo se realiza en forma conjunta ya que sus familias realizan respectivos trabajos en la agricultura, crías de animales, entre otras actividades. Las integrantes del comité se encuentran muy satisfechas con el programa ya que han podido crear sus propios trabajos y generar un poco más de dinero para sus hogares.
Una de las integrantes Luisa se encarga de la cría de animales. Ella se encarga de alimentarlo con la mejor calidad disponible y accesible para ellos, también ella debe pasearlos, volver a meterlos en los establos, etc. 
El crédito solicitado para ella y para todas las mujeres han sido invertidos para aumentar sus actividades actuales y futuras.
texts.en:
The Committee Edijiwengatuwa II is made up of five minor women in the indigenous community of Ache.  These young women, since they are minors, have their parents as co-borowers and this work is also done together so that their families can complete their respective work in agriculture, animal husbandry, and other activities.  The members of the committee are very satisfied with the program since them have been able to create their own jobs and generate a little more money for their homes.

One of the members, Luisa, is in charge of raising animals.  She feeds them with the best food possible and available to them.  She also takes them out and returns them to the stables, etc.

The loan requested for her and for all the women will be invested in their present and future activities.

loans.use: to buy balanced foods.

loans.name: Erika Yamileth

texts.es: Erika Yamileth de veintitrés años de edad vive junto  a su compañero de vida Felipe y su hijo en casa propia; ella posee una tienda donde vende artículos de primera necesidad arroz, frijoles, leche, huevos, pan, entre otros, tiene varios años con el negocio y eso le ha regalado mucha experiencia que le permite obtener el máximo de ganancias, el negocio esta ubicado en su domicilio, ya tiene mucha clientela pues las personas la prefieren porque saben que su producto es de primera calidad, a precios accesibles pero sobre todo con un excelente servicio; Erika es una mujer emprendedora, dedicada su labor y a su familia, tiene muchas metas que desea alcanzar y siempre esta en la búsqueda de oportunidades que le abran paso a cumplir sus sueños, en los últimos meses aumento la demanda de los productos y desea aprovechar para una nueva inversión por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar granos básicos, golosinas, pan, producto instantáneo, bebidas, jabones, etc. Erika Yamileth tiene buenas referencias de pago y una moral intachable, asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y al mismo tiempo tiene fe que le dará a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Erika Yamileth is twenty-three years old. She lives with her partner Felipe and their son in their own house. She has a shop where she sells basic items such as rice, broad beans, milk, eggs, and bread. She has been tending to this shop for many years, and her vast experience enables her to have a very good income. The shop is located in her house. She has a lot of customers because people know that she sells quality products at affordable prices, and, above all, that the service is excellent. Erika is very hardworking and motivated, dedicated to both her work and her family. She has many goals she wishes to reach and is always on the lookout for opportunities that can help her accomplish her dreams. In the last few months, demand for her products has risen, and she wishes to take advantage of that to sell more. That is why she asks field partner INTEGRAL for a loan in order to buy basic grains, sweets, bread, instant food, drinks, soap, etc. Erika has a very good credit history and strong morals. She guarantees that she will be able to repay her loan and she knows she will be able to improve her family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy more products to sell in her shop.

loans.name: Fernando

texts.es:
El socio Fernando sigue perteneciendo al banco comunal “Mi Perú” de la Asociación Arariwa Cusco, Perú. 

El socio Fernando tiene 50 años de edad y es casado y fruto de esta hermosa  relación tiene 2 hijos,  el socio Fernando sigue con el negocio de la venta de útiles de escritorio librería como por ejemplo cuadernos, lapiceros, borradores y otras cosas más.  

El socio Fernando solicita el préstamo para implementar su negocio como cuadernos, papeles,  lapiceros, plumones y entre otros.  El socio Fernando agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Fernando is still a member of the communal bank “Mi Perú” [My Peru] in the Asociación Arariwa in Cusco, Peru.

Fernando is 50 years old. He is married, and his wonderful marriage has produced two children. Fernando continues to run his business selling office supplies such as notebooks, pencils, erasers, and other items.

Fernando is requesting this loan to supply his business with notebooks, paper, pencils, pens, and other items. Fernando is grateful to everyone who has contributed to his dream through this site. He is committed to make his loan payments on time.

loans.use: sell office supplies such as notebooks, pencils, erasers, and other items.

loans.name: Marcelina

texts.es:
La señora Marcelina de 56 años de edad, es madre soltera no tiene dependientes, vive con su madre que ya esta bastante mayor, su casa esta ubicada en la cuidad de Nacaome, en la parte sur de Honduras, en donde todo los días sale al mercado y a lugares aledaños a vender sus productos plásticos, ropa y calzado en el mercado de Nacaome.
Doña Marcelina esta solicitando 10,000.00 lempiras para compra de zapato y ropa interior. Con el apoyo del préstamo ella invertirá más en su negocio y tendrá mejores ganancias.
Doña Marcelina su sueño es seguir trabajando y mejorando su negocio y también mejorar su casa.
